mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_LAYOUT ( F_LAYOUT_ID, F_OWNER_VARIANT_ID, F_NAME, F_PARENT_LAYOUT_ID, F_TARGET_TYPE, F_TARGET_FIELD_FIELD_ID, F_TARGET_MESSAGE_MESSAGE_ID, F_STYLE_STYLE_ID, F_LEFT, F_TOP, F_RIGHT, F_BOTTOM, F_WIDTH, F_HEIGHT, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{ layoutId }, #{ ownerVariantId }, #{ name }, #{ parentLayoutId }, #{ targetType }, #{ targetFieldFieldId }, #{ targetMessageMessageId }, #{ styleStyleId }, #{ left }, #{ top }, #{ right }, #{ bottom }, #{ width }, #{ height }, (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_LAYOUT SET F_OWNER_VARIANT_ID = #{ ownerVariantId }, F_NAME = #{ name }, F_PARENT_LAYOUT_ID = #{ parentLayoutId }, F_TARGET_TYPE = #{ targetType }, F_TARGET_FIELD_FIELD_ID = #{ targetFieldFieldId }, F_TARGET_MESSAGE_MESSAGE_ID = #{ targetMessageMessageId }, F_STYLE_STYLE_ID = #{ styleStyleId }, F_LEFT = #{ left }, F_TOP = #{ top }, F_RIGHT = #{ right }, F_BOTTOM = #{ bottom }, F_WIDTH = #{ width }, F_HEIGHT = #{ height }, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) WHERE F_LAYOUT_ID = #{ layoutId } AND F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = #{ _lastUpdatedAt }
mapper.select: SELECT T1.F_LAYOUT_ID AS "layoutId", T1.F_OWNER_VARIANT_ID AS "ownerVariantId", T1.F_NAME AS "name", T1.F_PARENT_LAYOUT_ID AS "parentLayoutId", T1.F_TARGET_TYPE AS "targetType", T1.F_TARGET_FIELD_FIELD_ID AS "targetFieldFieldId", T1.F_TARGET_MESSAGE_MESSAGE_ID AS "targetMessageMessageId", T1.F_STYLE_STYLE_ID AS "styleStyleId", T1.F_LEFT AS "left", T1.F_TOP AS "top", T1.F_RIGHT AS "right", T1.F_BOTTOM AS "bottom", T1.F_WIDTH AS "width", T1.F_HEIGHT AS "height", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_NAME AS "_title", T3.F_NAME AS "owner_title", T4.F_NAME AS "parent_title", T6.F_CLASS_NAME || '/' || T5.F_FIELD_NAME AS "targetField_title", T7.F_MESSAGE_NAME AS "targetMessage_title", T8.F_NAME AS "style_title", T9.F_VALUE_ID AS "targetType_title" FROM T_LAYOUT T1 LEFT JOIN T_FORM_VARIANT T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_VARIANT_ID = T2.F_VARIANT_ID LEFT JOIN T_FORM T3 ON T2.F_OWNER_FORM_ID = T3.F_FORM_ID LEFT JOIN T_LAYOUT T4 ON T1.F_PARENT_LAYOUT_ID = T4.F_LAYOUT_ID LEFT JOIN T_FIELD T5 ON T1.F_TARGET_FIELD_FIELD_ID = T5.F_FIELD_ID LEFT JOIN T_CLASS T6 ON T5.F_OWNER_CLASS_ID = T6.F_CLASS_ID LEFT JOIN T_MESSAGE T7 ON T1.F_TARGET_MESSAGE_MESSAGE_ID = T7.F_MESSAGE_ID LEFT JOIN T_STYLE T8 ON T1.F_STYLE_STYLE_ID = T8.F_STYLE_ID LEFT JOIN T_ENUM_VALUE T9 ON T9.F_OWNER_ENUM_ID = 3 AND T1.F_TARGET_TYPE = T9.F_VALUE_ID WHERE T1.F_LAYOUT_ID = #{ layoutId }
SELECT MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_LAYOUT T1

SELECT T1.F_VARIANT_ID AS "variantId", T1.F_OWNER_FORM_ID AS "ownerFormId", T1.F_WIDTH AS "width", T1.F_HEIGHT AS "height", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T2.F_NAME AS "_title", T2.F_NAME AS "owner_title" FROM T_FORM_VARIANT T1 LEFT JOIN T_FORM T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_FORM_ID = T2.F_FORM_ID WHERE T1.F_VARIANT_ID = #{ ownerVariantId }

SELECT MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_FORM_VARIANT T1
T2.F_NAME LIKE '%' || #{hint} || '%'

SELECT T1.F_LAYOUT_ID AS "layoutId", T1.F_OWNER_VARIANT_ID AS "ownerVariantId", T1.F_NAME AS "name", T1.F_PARENT_LAYOUT_ID AS "parentLayoutId", T1.F_TARGET_TYPE AS "targetType", T1.F_TARGET_FIELD_FIELD_ID AS "targetFieldFieldId", T1.F_TARGET_MESSAGE_MESSAGE_ID AS "targetMessageMessageId", T1.F_STYLE_STYLE_ID AS "styleStyleId", T1.F_LEFT AS "left", T1.F_TOP AS "top", T1.F_RIGHT AS "right", T1.F_BOTTOM AS "bottom", T1.F_WIDTH AS "width", T1.F_HEIGHT AS "height", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_NAME AS "_title", T3.F_NAME AS "owner_title", T4.F_NAME AS "parent_title", T6.F_CLASS_NAME || '/' || T5.F_FIELD_NAME AS "targetField_title", T7.F_MESSAGE_NAME AS "targetMessage_title", T8.F_NAME AS "style_title", T9.F_VALUE_ID AS "targetType_title" FROM T_LAYOUT T1 LEFT JOIN T_FORM_VARIANT T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_VARIANT_ID = T2.F_VARIANT_ID LEFT JOIN T_FORM T3 ON T2.F_OWNER_FORM_ID = T3.F_FORM_ID LEFT JOIN T_LAYOUT T4 ON T1.F_PARENT_LAYOUT_ID = T4.F_LAYOUT_ID LEFT JOIN T_FIELD T5 ON T1.F_TARGET_FIELD_FIELD_ID = T5.F_FIELD_ID LEFT JOIN T_CLASS T6 ON T5.F_OWNER_CLASS_ID = T6.F_CLASS_ID LEFT JOIN T_MESSAGE T7 ON T1.F_TARGET_MESSAGE_MESSAGE_ID = T7.F_MESSAGE_ID LEFT JOIN T_STYLE T8 ON T1.F_STYLE_STYLE_ID = T8.F_STYLE_ID LEFT JOIN T_ENUM_VALUE T9 ON T9.F_OWNER_ENUM_ID = 3 AND T1.F_TARGET_TYPE = T9.F_VALUE_ID WHERE T1.F_LAYOUT_ID = #{ parentLayoutId }

SELECT MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_LAYOUT T1
T1.F_NAME LIKE '%' || #{hint} || '%'

SELECT T1.F_FIELD_ID AS "fieldId", T1.F_OWNER_CLASS_ID AS "ownerClassId", T1.F_FIELD_NAME AS "fieldName", T1.F_TYPE AS "type", T1.F_WIDTH AS "width", T1.F_SCALE AS "scale", T1.F_CREF_CLASS_ID AS "crefClassId", T1.F_EREF_ENUM_ID AS "erefEnumId", T1.F_FREF_FIELD_ID AS "frefFieldId", T1.F_PK AS "pk", T1.F_NULLABLE AS "nullable", T1.F_NEEDS_SUM AS "needsSum", T1.F_NEEDS_AVG AS "needsAvg", T1.F_NEEDS_MAX AS "needsMax", T1.F_NEEDS_MIN AS "needsMin", T1.F_IS_CONTAINER AS "isContainer", T1.F_FORMAT AS "format", T1.F_TITLE AS "title", T1.F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", T1.F_NOTE AS "note", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T2.F_CLASS_NAME || '/' || T1.F_FIELD_NAME AS "_title", T2.F_CLASS_NAME || '(' || T2.F_TITLE || ')' AS "owner_title", T3.F_CLASS_NAME || '(' || T3.F_TITLE || ')' AS "cref_title", T4.F_ENUM_NAME || '(' || T4.F_TITLE || ')' AS "eref_title", T6.F_CLASS_NAME || '/' || T5.F_FIELD_NAME AS "fref_title", T7.F_VALUE_ID AS "type_title" FROM T_FIELD T1 LEFT JOIN T_CLASS T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_CLASS_ID = T2.F_CLASS_ID LEFT JOIN T_CLASS T3 ON T1.F_CREF_CLASS_ID = T3.F_CLASS_ID LEFT JOIN T_ENUM T4 ON T1.F_EREF_ENUM_ID = T4.F_ENUM_ID LEFT JOIN T_FIELD T5 ON T1.F_FREF_FIELD_ID = T5.F_FIELD_ID LEFT JOIN T_CLASS T6 ON T5.F_OWNER_CLASS_ID = T6.F_CLASS_ID LEFT JOIN T_ENUM_VALUE T7 ON T7.F_OWNER_ENUM_ID = 1 AND T1.F_TYPE = T7.F_VALUE_ID WHERE T1.F_FIELD_ID = #{ targetFieldFieldId }

SELECT MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_FIELD T1
T2.F_CLASS_NAME || '/' || T1.F_FIELD_NAME LIKE '%' || #{hint} || '%'

SELECT T1.F_MESSAGE_ID AS "messageId", T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID AS "ownerProjectId", T1.F_MESSAGE_NAME AS "messageName", T1.F_MESSAGE AS "message", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_MESSAGE_NAME AS "_title", T2.F_PROJECT_NAME || '(' || T2.F_TITLE || ')' AS "owner_title" FROM T_MESSAGE T1 LEFT JOIN T_PROJECT T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = T2.F_PROJECT_ID WHERE T1.F_MESSAGE_ID = #{ targetMessageMessageId }

SELECT MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_MESSAGE T1
T1.F_MESSAGE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{hint} || '%'

SELECT T1.F_STYLE_ID AS "styleId", T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID AS "ownerProjectId", T1.F_NAME AS "name", T1.F_PARENT_STYLE_ID AS "parentStyleId", T1.F_COND AS "cond", T1.F_COND_PARAM AS "condParam", T1.F_TEXT_COLOR AS "textColor", T1.F_BACKGROUND_COLOR AS "backgroundColor", T1.F_BACKGROUND_IMAGE AS "backgroundImage", T1.F_BORDER_LEFT AS "borderLeft", T1.F_BORDER_TOP AS "borderTop", T1.F_BORDER_RIGHT AS "borderRight", T1.F_BORDER_BOTTOM AS "borderBottom", T1.F_BORDER_COLOR AS "borderColor", T1.F_BORDER_IMAGE AS "borderImage", T1.F_FONT_SIZE AS "fontSize", T1.F_FONT_FAMILY AS "fontFamily", T1.F_LINE_HEIGHT AS "lineHeight", T1.F_TEXT_ALIGN AS "textAlign", T1.F_VERTICAL_ALIGN AS "verticalAlign", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_NAME AS "_title", T2.F_PROJECT_NAME || '(' || T2.F_TITLE || ')' AS "owner_title", T3.F_NAME AS "parent_title", T4.F_VALUE_ID AS "cond_title" FROM T_STYLE T1 LEFT JOIN T_PROJECT T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = T2.F_PROJECT_ID LEFT JOIN T_STYLE T3 ON T1.F_PARENT_STYLE_ID = T3.F_STYLE_ID LEFT JOIN T_ENUM_VALUE T4 ON T4.F_OWNER_ENUM_ID = 2 AND T1.F_COND = T4.F_VALUE_ID WHERE T1.F_STYLE_ID = #{ styleStyleId }

SELECT MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_STYLE T1
T1.F_NAME LIKE '%' || #{hint} || '%'
SELECT MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_LAYOUT T1 WHERE F_PARENT_LAYOUT_ID = #{ content.layoutId }
